text.div:
Giardiasis (Tests for Giardia species Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    60544-4 Giardia lamblia DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    80683-6 Giardia lamblia 18S rRNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
    82208-0 Giardia lamblia DNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with non-probe detection
    90299-9 Giardia sp DNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
    91767-4 Giardia sp DNA [Presence] in Duodenal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    91836-7 Giardia sp DNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    92687-3 Giardia lamblia DNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
